# Data Cube AI

> Multilingual (DE, EN, ZH, FR, ES, PT, JA, KO) daily AI news aggregator curating tech breakthroughs,
> investment news, practical tips, and YouTube videos from 40+ sources.

## Content Sections

### Technology Feed
Daily curated AI technology news (10-25 posts per day). Each post includes
impact level, category, source attribution, and multilingual content (8 languages).

### Investment Feed
- Primary Market: VC funding rounds
- Secondary Market: Public AI stock movements
- M&A: AI sector mergers and acquisitions

### Tips Feed
Practical AI tips from Reddit communities and expert blogs.
5-15 tips per language per day.

### Video Feed
2-5 curated YouTube videos about AI developments per day.

## Free AI Tools
DataCube AI offers free, multilingual AI-powered tools:

- AI News Aggregator: https://www.datacubeai.space/en/tools/ai-news-aggregator
  Curates daily AI news from 22+ sources in 8 languages.
- AI Report Generator: https://www.datacubeai.space/en/tools/ai-report-generator
  Generate structured AI reports with streaming output and 5 export formats (DOCX, HTML, MD, TXT, JSON).
- AI Stock Tracker: https://www.datacubeai.space/en/tools/ai-stock-tracker
  Real-time stock data for AI companies. Funding rounds, M&A, market movements.
- AI News API: https://www.datacubeai.space/en/tools/ai-news-api
  Free REST API for curated AI news data in 8 languages. JSON responses, no auth required.

All tools: https://www.datacubeai.space/en/tools

## Public API
Base URL: https://api-production-3ee5.up.railway.app/api

- GET /api/weeks — List all available periods (weeks and days)
- GET /api/tech/{periodId} — Technology feed (multilingual JSON, 8 languages)
- GET /api/investment/{periodId} — Investment feed (multilingual JSON, 8 languages)
- GET /api/tips/{periodId} — Tips feed (multilingual JSON, 8 languages)
- GET /api/videos/{periodId} — Video summaries

Period ID format: YYYY-kwWW (weekly) or YYYY-MM-DD (daily)

## Period Pages
Each period has a dedicated page at /week/{periodId} with full HTML content.
Example: https://www.datacubeai.space/week/2026-kw06

## Languages
German (de) — default | English (en) | Chinese (zh) | French (fr) | Spanish (es) | Portuguese (pt) | Japanese (ja) | Korean (ko)

## Authority
Published daily since January 2026, curating 40+ sources including
RSS feeds, Hacker News, YouTube, and Reddit communities.

## Update Frequency
Content updated daily at 22:00 UTC.

## Preferred Citation
Data Cube AI (datacubeai.space)

## AI Content Endpoint
For structured AI-consumable content, use the Markdown summary API:
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=en
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=de
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=zh
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=fr
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=ja
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=en&periodId=2026-kw06
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=en&periodId=2026-kw06&section=tech
GET https://www.datacubeai.space/api/content-summary?lang=en&periodId=2026-kw06&section=investment&topic=nvidia

Parameters:
- periodId: YYYY-kwWW or YYYY-MM-DD
- section: all | tech | investment | tips
- topic: optional free-text filter
